metadata.title: CVE-2020-18184 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In PluxXml V5.7,the theme edit function/PluXml/core/admin/parametres_edittpl.php allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary PHP code by placing this code into a template.

criterions.comment: pluxml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
